document_data.mainbody:
rights Ferry was a small village located in Featherdale.
The hamlet was located along the River Ashaba about halfway between Blackfeather Bridge and Feather Falls
Wrights Ferry was home to 30 individuals in the . The hamlet included several orchards and pig farms, the horse ferry for which the village was named, a small pond, and a single tavern. A bizarre ring of stones called the Chessmen of Valsprendar was believed to be linked to some magic ritual.
=
